attributes.action: Dissolve Devolution for Scotland and The Scottish Parliament
attributes.additional_details: Despite what the so called "Opinion Polls" say; the vast Majority of rational and intelligent Scots DO NOT Support the Separation of Scotland from the UK. We are both Scottish AND British.
attributes.background: The Scottish Parliament have made Scotland a laughing stock; in particular the SNP MSP's who have backed Nicola Sturgeon and her crazy rhetoric. Many of us Served in The UK Armed Forces and are disgusted with the "Anti English/Westminster" attitudes.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the removal of the devolved institutions of Scotland are a matter for the people of Scotland, not the UK Government or Parliament.
